name: Crystal Ball of Firmament
description:
Description:

The spell book is missing! Help the magician to find it in this #action #platformer adventure. Use the crystal ball to change asters position to make your path, collect tokens and buy useful upgrades.

UPDATE #2

  • Fixed ghost desync.
  • Fixed audio don't save options (Not HTML5).

UPDATE #1

  • Fixed head decapitation when dead (HTML5).
  • No player control when dead.
  • Backgrounded environment elements.
  • Changed some sprites.
  • Added level counter.

Note:

Entry made for #NoticeMe game jam in two weeks. Art, code, music and most of sound effects were made during this period. Plays better with gamepad.

Enjoy!
